name: Fever 3: Sankyo Koushiki Pachinko Simulation
overview: Fever 3: Sankyo Koushiki Pachinko Simulation is the third game in the pachinko gambling series released by ICS for the Playstation one console and is a gambling game that features 4 pachinko gambling machines (Fever Densha de Go! Ex, SR & Gp & CR Super Combi SP).
